author: Joann Muller
title: Automakers lay out back-to-work playbook for coronavirus pandemic
description: The auto industry is sharing detailed return-to-work guidelines on how to shield employees from the coronavirus as it prepares to reopen its own factories in the coming weeks. Why it matters: We might not shake hands again, but sooner or later, most of us wil…
content:
